channel.title: A big question on 667's [READ HERE]
channel.description:
My friend is currently trying to host a 667. He has portforwarded etc, because i can get on it.
But how come You need java 7 to run it? or else it will say .loader cant be found..
I dont understand how people can play matrix with lower java? Im utterly confused , please help me...
I Can log on his server fine, But a few other people cannot, is it the protocal in loader.java or what am i doing wrong...?

item.title: A big question on 667's [READ HERE]
item.dc:creator: @BentonScape BentonScape
item.description:
@BentonScape wrote:

You Need To Run The Server Off A Certian Java Not All Ramdom Ones, Jre7 Or Jre6 Should Be Fine.

Read full topic
